* ![](https://mpcity.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/MunicipalCourt.jpg "MunicipalCourt")

> 501 N Madison
> Mount Pleasant, TX 75455

> Phone: 903-575-4010
> Fax: 903-575-4121

> Monday – Friday
> 8 a.m. – 5 p.m.
> Excluding city holidays

> The Municipal Court has  original and exclusive jurisdiction over violations of city ordinances and, within the city limits, have concurrent jurisdiction with justice of the peace courts over Class C misdemeanor criminal cases where punishment upon conviction is by small fine only. To see the municipal judge you must be present in Municipal Court at 8:00 a.m., Monday-Friday.

CONTACT
-------

> Kay McNutt
> Municipal Court Judge
> [Email](mailto:judge@mpcity.org)
>
> Adolfo Martinez
> Court Administrator
> [Email](mailto:amartinez@mpcity.org)



[PAY A TICKET NOW](https://www.trafficpayment.com/SearchByInvoiceInfo.aspx?csdId=507&AspxAutoDetectCookieSupport=1)

Phone payments Monday – Friday from 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.

#### Call toll-free 1-800-444-1187.

* Expired driver’s license – proof of renewal within 20 working days of the offense. $20 dismissal fee.
* Expired motor vehicle registration – proof that you registered the vehicle within 20 working days and proof that you paid the late fee as shown on your receipt from the vehicle registration office. – $20 dismissal fee.



If you are charged with a traffic offense, you may be eligible to ask the judge to take a drivers safety course to dismiss the charge. The request must be made on or before the appearance date on the citation. it must be made in person, by counsel, or by certified mail. (if you are under age 17, you must appear in open court with a parent or guardian to make a request) If you were operating a motorcycle, you may be required to take a motorcycle operator’s training course.

If you need an extension of time to pay a fine, you must request it when you make your plea. The court will grant you 30 days to pay the fine.

If you require more than 30 days, you will need to request a payment agreement. A fee of $15.00 will be added for each offense, as required by state law.

[![Warrant and Jail Information](https://mpcity.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/WarrantGraphic-1.jpg "Warrant Information")](https://mpcity.net/warrants)
